amendatorysection.catchline: Adult institutions; disciplinary procedures; laws governing.
amendatorysection.para: Disciplinary procedures in adult institutions administered by the Department of Correctional Services shall be governed by the provisions of sections 83-4,109 to 83-4,123.

annotation.para: Sections 83-4,109 to 83-4,123 constitute a special act relating to disciplinary procedures in adult correctional institutions and control over the more general provisions which are found in the Administrative Procedure Act. Reed v. Parratt, 207 Neb. 796, 301 N.W.2d 343 (1981).
